reviewText: couldn't ask for anything better for a abraham addict. lol gotta love esther and Jerry too.

I have been listening to Abraham for two years now and continue to find such great spiritual insights in each and every CD and DVD.This DVD is rich in guidance and loving support. I highly recommend it for those looking to enhance their life experience.
I enjoy watching Abraham. Like the rest of the DVDs, this one provides much useful information about how to achieve well-being. Love the explanation!
Every DVD that comes out is better than the last. This one DVD is so over the top you that the only way to give it credit is to watch it.

I love everything about this episode. Esther(ABraham) is always so entertaining and right on with everyones questions. But then I love all of the DVD's that I have viewed and always look forward to the next one.

Life altering, just get it and watch, listen, feel your way thru....
Thank you Esther, Jerry and Abraham.....

All of the Abraham-Hicks materials are amazing. They speak to the whole of me and I enjoy hearing them over and over. Each time hearing something more than before. They are the most kind and loving teachers/beings that I have ever encountered.
As usual Esther Hicks is so great in this DVD and touches my life every time I watch it.

When you're going with the flow, effort is a non-issue!" "Relax and roll. Here we go!" Abraham responds to questions about sex, Indigo Children, surviving a motorcycle accident, dreams and anger, judgment and punishment. Plus, the full, detailed story of how Jerry & Esther came to know Abraham. And don't forget folks, "reality doesn't mean diddly-squat!" ----------------------------------------------- Featuring an Abraham-inspired daily practice for maintaining a youthful zest for life!

I've been studying Abraham's teachings on Law of Attraction for several years now in depth and have also attended several live seminars. I have a large collection of their work. These 2 DVDs have THE MOST clear explanation and examples of questions and answers that pertain to me and what I have been missing in my own personal LOA learnings. On disc 1 Abraham's answer to a blonde lady about making peace where you are and source loving you & accepting yourself answer brought me to tears with appreciation.

This is the most profound set of DVDs I've ever viewed on why some LOA isn't working for me and clear steps to take to make my results better. I've written out by hand a few of Abe's answers even. I'd give this more than 5 stars if I could.
If you have any questions about your personal life and the Law of Attraction, you will enjoy this DVD.  All the questions and answers are very clear and on point.
So Grateful for Esther & Jerry Hicks and all they contribute to our well-being!

This dvd like all others will help you get in alignment with who you are and all the dvds will give you something even if the message is the same it gives different views and we just love them and its the kind of dvd you will watch over and over and each time you will understand it better. What a JOY it is to have these dvds.

I have watched many Abraham-Hicks DVDs and they have all evolved me in ways I never dreamed. This random selection on my part has several well grounded perspectives on dreams, negative experiences in childhood, anger, etc. Ester Hicks has obviously matured her relationship with, and ability to verbalize the messages she receives from Abraham, the collection of entities she represents. It is as always, mind-expanding, which is the only reason to watch anyway.

I was exhausted after viewing this DVD. It brought up so many emotions and revelations within me, that I sat in awe of the experience. What an emotional work out this DVD is! I would highly recommend it to anyone desiring a deeper understanding of how we participate in manifesting our life experiences. Unbelievable stuff!

Maybe it was where I WAS at the time I watched this DVD, but each topic resonated with me and gave me a "AH-HA" moment.  I have never been dissapointed with an
Abraham-Hicks product - and this was no exception.

This video of Esther Hicks presenting Abraham is just nothing short of amazing.  I have not seen Abraham in person yet (although I'm going to in one month and can't wait!) but this dvd is full of non-stop information for life.  It is so intuitive that I can't explain it, just soak it up!  You can't go wrong with anything the Hicks provide.
The words of Abraham thru Esther are an amazing help.  The questions of others and the answers given also hit home.

"When you're going with the flow, effort is a non-issue!" "Relax and roll. Here we go!" Abraham responds to questions about sex, Indigo Children, surviving a motorcycle accident, dreams and anger, judgment and punishment. Plus, the full, detailed story of how Jerry & Esther came to know Abraham. And don't forget folks, "reality doesn't mean diddly-squat!" ----------------------------------------------------------------- Featuring an Abraham-inspired daily practice for maintaining a youthful zest for life! ----------------------------------------------------------------- AND: " I am still coming down from the high of watching this incredible video 'headful'! " Introducing Abraham - The Secret Behind "The Secret"
Enjoy Esther & Jerry Hicks programs and this is another good one.
You can never go wrong with any of Abraham's DVDs.
One of the best Abraham Hicks videos I've seen. Really good information! I want to share it with all my friends and family.
I sent this to a friend.  A good Hicks DVD.
Cool info
Excellent! I love everything that Esther and Abraham produce! :D
Excellent
Nice tool to have in life

It's hard to click stars to rate when words have to follow.  Anyone looking for Esther/Abraham KNOWS what to expect and KNOWS each is better than the previous.  Amazing work - and never fails to enlighten with new avenues of understanding and awareness.

unless you are totally into finding out about the law of attraction via Q & A sessions with Abraham; and have an interest in the law of attraction, this might not be for you.
by the by, this was interesting for me.
